Constructor Detail

OAColorComboBox

public OAColorComboBox()
Create an unbound ColorComboBox.

OAColorComboBox

public OAColorComboBox(Hub hub,
                       java.lang.String propertyPath,
                       int columns)
Create a ColorComboBox that is bound to a property for the active object in a Hub.

Parameters:
hub - is Hub that used to display and edit color property in active object
propertyPath - is color property to display/edit
columns - is width to use, using average character width

OAColorComboBox

                       java.lang.String propertyPath)

propertyPath - is color property to display/edit

OAColorComboBox

public OAColorComboBox(java.lang.Object obj,
                       java.lang.String propertyPath,
                       int columns)
Create a ColorComboBox that is bound to a property for an object.

Parameters:
obj - is object to be bound to
propertyPath - is color property to display/edit
columns - is width to use, using average character width
